category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ProcessSimulate_DataPrep_Expiration
preference.preference_description: Defines the maximum age in hours of a prepared PLMXML file before the file is considered to be invalid or stale by the Process Simulate application. A value equal to zero disables this check. A valid value can be a decimal number of hours (the decimal separator being a dot, e.g. 1.5).
